params.name: Human-readable term name.
params.parentTermId: Optional parent term for hierarchy (bytes32(0) for root).
params.vocabId: The vocabulary this term belongs to.

params.parentTermId: The new parent term ID (bytes32(0) for root).

addTerm(bytes32,bytes32,string,bytes32).notice: Adds a term to an existing vocabulary.

getTermChildren(bytes32).notice: Retrieves the children of a term.

setParent(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Changes the parent of a term.

tagEntity(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Tags an entity with a taxonomy term.

untagEntity(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Removes a taxonomy term from an entity.
